name: GoogleAppsProvisioning
short_description:
This is a collection of function and classes for the Google Apps API for Business and education.
What can it manipulate:
1. Create new user
2. Change user's password (and if selected change password at next login)
3. Add user to a group
4. Remove user from a group
5. Return all groups an user is member of
6. Check if an username exists
7. Remove an user
8. Retrieve the Customer ID
9. Move an user to an Org Unit (folder or container)
10. Check if a specific nickaname exists
11. Add a nickname to an user
12. Set the send as alias for a specific user (Uses the Email API)
13. Retrieve the first 100 users in a specific Org Unit
14. Retrieve all users in a specific Org Unit.

TO DO:
1. Implement PHP[sessions] and eliminate the need to save the admin token to a file
2. Add more functions for google apps provisioning
3. Convert the accounts.php file into a class and optimize the code
summary: PHP implementation for Google Apps Provisioning API
